item.title: Vengeance 508
item.dc:creator: @gerhardt10102 gerhardt10102
item.description:
@gerhardt10102 wrote:

[quote=“davedave, post:12, topic:250877”] Misc.random(maxMeleeHit§);
if(p2.vengOn) {
p.appendHit((int)((hitDamage/4)*3), 0);
p2.chatText = “Taste Vengeance!”;
p2.chatTextUpdateReq = true;
p2.updateReq = true;
p2.vengOn = false;
}

I remember following that tutorial on google, I edited it a bit for it to work, not exactly sure how. Tell me if it worked.[/quote] ok ill get back to ya 1 min[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 16, 2008, 12:29:26 am[/size][hr][quote=“davedave, post:12, topic:250877”] Misc.random(maxMeleeHit§);
if(p2.vengOn) {
p.appendHit((int)((hitDamage/4)*3), 0);
p2.chatText = “Taste Vengeance!”;
p2.chatTextUpdateReq = true;
p2.updateReq = true;
p2.vengOn = false;
}

I remember following that tutorial on google, I edited it a bit for it to work, not exactly sure how. Tell me if it worked.[/quote] Didnt work, thanks for helping though
